name: Santa Booth 2016: Catch Santa in your house pictures
name_original: Santa Booth 2016: Catch Santa in your house pictures
description:
Show your kids proof that Santa was in your house last night! Merry Christmas from Santa Claus! Santa is real and you have the proof!

Easy to use:

1) Take a picture of your living room
2) Choose the Santa you want you use
3) Combine and Save!

Have a merry christmas!
